attributes.title: VERY VERY bad app
attributes.review: I was minding my own business on the Trump app and then a Cheeto climbed through the screen and punched me in the face. I’m a paying customer and this was not okay.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app was so bad that it inspired all the conservatives in my area to change their opinion. It’s so glitchy and promotes a sense of hatred in everyone that uses it.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP. Before I downloaded the app my phone was fine, but immediately after my phone turned ORANGE! We should not have a racist Cheeto Puff as our president💕✨👑.

attributes.review: It completely slowed my phone down and made it unusable. SO MANY NOTIFICATIONS for no reason 0/10 recommend ❤️

attributes.title: MADE A HORRID DECISION THE DAY I DOWNLOADED

This app is AWFUL it took up all my space AND started making my phone glitchy it immediately drained all of its battery AND Trump stole my cat Rip brownie 2020 😣😭😭

attributes.title: We don’t support fruit🥱🍊
